czone.volume.algebraic.get_bounding_box(planes)¶

Input is iterable of Plane objects.

Determines if set of planes forms a valid interior convex region and returns vertices representing convex region.

If fails, returns 2 if no valid intersection returns 3 if intersection is unbounded

czone.volume.algebraic.snap_plane_near_point(point, generator, miller_indices, mode='nearest')¶

Returns nearest plane defined by miller indices in current generator coordinate system to the supplied point.

Mode: nearest- closest plane to point floor - next nearest valid plane towards generator origin ceil - next furthest valid plane from generator origin
